title: April Fools VS. Event Mission List
body:
#Hello everyone!

Here is the full Mission & Reward list for the April Fools Event (Ends April 1st 23:59 PST) [](
https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2019/march/afavn2019/tb-pr-fizz.jpg)


#####_**~~Cats~~**_ vs _*~~Dogs~~*_ line

* Mission 1:

> ###*The Most Serious VS. Yet: Win a game[](https://.) Rewards: Royal Kitty and Royal Doggo Icons*

* Mission 2 - Animal Instincts:

> ###*Win a gamePlay a game wearing your Dog Icon -OR- Play a game wearing your Cat Icon. [](https://.) Rewards: 500 XP*

At this point the paths split based on if you did _*~~Dog~~*_ Icon or _**~~Cat~~**_ Icon.

* Mission 3(_*~~Dog~~*_) - Good Boyes:

> ###*Play a game with or against Pug'maw, Corgi Corki, or Fuzz Fizz -OR- Gather the bones of 20 enemies (get 20 kills/assists) [](https://.) Rewards: Hextech Mystery Emote Permanent*


* Mission 3( _**~~Cat~~**_) - Fancy Felines: 

> ###*Play a game with or against Meowrick, Pretty Kitty Rengar, or Meowkai -OR- Turn 20 enemies into litter (get 20 kills/assists) [](https://.) Rewards: Hextech Mystery Emote Permanent*

* Mission 4(_*~~Dog~~*_) - Treats? Treats? Treats!:

> ###*Feed 3 Poros on ARAM -OR- Don't Share (As a team take down 2 dragons) [](https://.) Rewards: 1000 Blue Essence*


* Mission 4(_**~~Cat~~**_) - Food for the Strays:


    > ###*Feed 3 Poros on ARAM -OR- Don't Share (As a team take down 2 dragons [](https://.) Rewards: 1000 Blue Essence*

* Mission 5(_*~~Dog~~*_) - Ruin the Yard:

> ###*Dig for bones (Destroy 4 towers as a team) -OR- Chase squirrels instead (Kill 1,200 minions as a team) [](https://.) Rewards: 200 Orange Essence & Hextech Key*

* Mission 5(_**~~Cat~~**_) - Scratching Posts:

> ###*Sit on boxes (Destroy 4 towers as a team) -OR- Chase mice instead (Kill 1,200 minions as a team) [](https://.) Rewards: 200 Orange Essence & Hextech Key*

* Mission 6(_*~~Dog~~*_) - Pack Life:

> ###*Play a game as a 5 man premade group -OR- Win 2 games [](https://.) Rewards: Golden Dog Icon & Masterwork Chest*

* Mission 6(_**~~Cat~~**_)- Herding Cats:

> ###*Play a game as a 5 man premade group -OR- Win 2 games [](https://.) Rewards: Golden Cat Icon & Masterwork Chest*

***

| 
|:---:
| https://i.ibb.co/TWkBnWn/JXfM5jh.png https://i.ibb.co/TWkBnWn/JXfM5jh.png
| _***~~Impossible Mission Line~~***_
| https://i.ibb.co/0nkPKSq/eeFoCwQ.png

* Mission 1 - The Impossible Mission:

> ###*As Nunu&Willump, reach over 1000 movement speed with their biggest snowball ever! -OR- Fine, don't reach light speed (place 3 control wards) [](https://.) Rewards: Golden Cats vs Dogs Icon*


* Mission 2a - You took the easy path:

> ###*Do whatever. I don't care. (Play a game) [](https://.) Rewards: 2 Blue Essence*

* Mission 2b - Wait...Do what now?:

> ###*As a 5 player pre-made, lose a game of Co-Op vs AI [](https://.) Rewards: 2 Blue Essence*

After completing the 5 man lose a game of Co-Op

* Mission 3 - Time to Play your Displacements:

> ###*As a 5 player pre-made group, play a game with Singed, Alistar, Volibear, Poppy, and Blitzcrank on your team [](https://.) Rewards: Platinum Cats vs Dogs Icon*

| 
|:---:
| https://i.ibb.co/TWkBnWn/JXfM5jh.png https://i.ibb.co/TWkBnWn/JXfM5jh.png
| https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2019/march/afavn2019/tb-pr-fizz.jpg
| https://i.ibb.co/0nkPKSq/eeFoCwQ.png

replies.body:
Really? I did the 3 control ward one and now I can't get the icon? 
Just because there wasn't any communication?

> [{quoted}](name=Ducks are Epic,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:57:20.918+0000)
>
> Really? I did the 3 control ward one and now I can't get the icon? 
> Just because there wasn't any communication?

We have fixed it so everyone gets both paths now.
2 Days left on every missions ?? What is this ????????????????? give us time like some people can max play 1 match a day !!?
Maybe it's an April Fool's joke.. #Hopeful..

> [{quoted}](name=Ducks are Epic,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:57:20.918+0000)
>
> Really? I did the 3 control ward one and now I can't get the icon? 
> Just because there wasn't any communication?

It's pretty dumb that they keep doing things like this, but you should submit a ticket if you accidentally completed the "easy" mission first.

> [{quoted}](name=Ducks are Epic,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:57:20.918+0000)
>
> Really? I did the 3 control ward one and now I can't get the icon? 
> Just because there wasn't any communication?

Is there any way to get it now?

> [{quoted}](name=Ducks are Epic,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-03-27T23:02:33.965+0000)
>
> Is there any way to get it now?

I’m assuming not, which really pisses me off

> [{quoted}](name=Ducks are Epic,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:57:20.918+0000)
>
> Really? I did the 3 control ward one and now I can't get the icon? 
> Just because there wasn't any communication?

chill wtf, you get the icon either way??
now you can get the icon. Originally you couldn't

Seriously? You’re locking those who put control wards down?

That is really messed up...

Update at 4:41 PM PST:   We've heard your feedback about missing the Nunu objective but still wanting to do the other Impossible Missions.  We're pushing an update that will unlock the 2nd Impossible Mission for you regardless of how you completed the first one - meaning if you placed 3 wards, you will still get the 2nd Impossible Mission.

This will be live shortly.  Sorry for the frustration and thanks for giving us your feedback!

instead of that can you put the mission as an AND rather than OR?

that way everyone will need to reach 1k ms as nunu for the plat icon.

If someone already did the mission, give them the nunu one anyway. Can also make it sound like a joke "Nah, i still want you to reach 1000 ms as nunu <3", and they cannot move ahead without finishing this one.

Not to fix it this quickly, no.   And to get the platinum icon, players will still have to complete the other two impossible missions as-is because they do not have B objectives.  We felt this was the best way to resolve this quickly for people that didn't mean to complete the first B objective and no longer had a chance to do the other ones.
Forcing players to make a 5man premade is stupid. A lot of us do not have the connections to do this.
Yeah. The Star Guardian event a few years ago got a lot of backlash for its hard, premade missions, after which Riot promised not to force premade missions anymore. Well, here we go again!

It's absolutely insane to me that you didn't foresee this. Like how could it be that no one at Riot thought "Oh players don't like being locked out of content due to playing the game as they normally would"
Theres an issue every single time they choose to do an event. Its insane they're a billion dollar company and still fuck up and they never learn from it.

Yes, it's so very insane and hard to believe that a group of humans could fail to be perfect year in and year out like this. That they could not see every possible scenario, that they could ever make mistakes. HOW DARE

yeah but they didn't handle this well at all. first of all they made people who just played a normal game first feel bad cus placing control wards locked them out of the mission but then they said a big f u to the people who actually put the effort into completing the nunu mission by saying yknow what lets just give people the option to just place some control wards instead after u had to basically int a game playing MS nunu

After 9 years... Yeah, its insane! Imagine if group of humans ( surgeons ) failed to be perfect year in and year out ( resulting them having increased mortality rates)? HOW DARE THEY!!!!

Problem lies: 9 years of experience !== beginners mistakes!
But yeah, continue on blindly deffending them. I won't stop ya! :D

Bless you guys

You almost pulled a fast one on us {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Xenogenic,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-03-27T23:42:12.571+0000)
>
> Update at 4:41 PM PST:   We've heard your feedback about missing the Nunu objective but still wanting to do the other Impossible Missions.  We're pushing an update that will unlock the 2nd Impossible Mission for you regardless of how you completed the first one - meaning if you placed 3 wards, you will still get the 2nd Impossible Mission.
> 
> This will be live shortly.  Sorry for the frustration and thanks for giving us your feedback!

You have no idea what that means to support mains, who often put far more than 3 control wards down in a single game.

{{champion:117}} much love
Huge missed opportunity not calling it the Impawssible mission line
On one hand, it's just an icon. On the other hand, it's an icon!

I thought riot learned their lesson about 5 man premade missions. Gamers are solitary creatures. A lot of us do not have enough friends on LoL to make a premade. So this mission is a waste for us. Now we have to sit there and see it on our list and we will never be able to get that last reward.

STOP THE PREMADE 5MAN MISSIONS!!!

> [{quoted}](name=SciFi Scrivener,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=001d,timestamp=2019-03-28T13:03:17.032+0000)
>
> I thought riot learned their lesson about 5 man premade missions. Gamers are solitary creatures. A lot of us do not have enough friends on LoL to make a premade. So this mission is a waste for us. Now we have to sit there and see it on our list and we will never be able to get that last reward.
> 
> STOP THE PREMADE 5MAN MISSIONS!!!

I managed to get 5 people together by posting on all discord severs im in. Took around 20 min of waiting per game. Good that there were only 2 missions.

I'm glad ti worked for you, but I shouldn't have to use another program to complete missions in LoL. Until league has a public chat option for players to find premades, these kind of missions ruin the experience.

I'm glad you made missions that can be completed by anyone, including people who have no interest in PvP, so fair play for that. I also applaud the rewards of most missions, like the Hextech Key + Chest, and the Orange Essence, but my compliments have to end there.

The mission where you require people to make a pre-made kind of makes it seem like you don't really know your audience. No one likes to be forced to team up. Even the 4 people that get randomly assigned to your team in Co-op games are, often, undesirable, so now you ask us to actively look for them? Adding insult to injury, you ask us to add a loss to our profile, willingly? Seriously, who came up with this mission idea? What other (likely better) ideas were ignored to choose this one instead?

Fortunately, the ''reward'' is just an icon, so I'll skip this, and it wouldn't surprise me if others do it too. We spend around 20-30m in a match to win, not to lose, and we're not going to spend even MORE time looking for random strangers to do it with. Even if we did... for an icon? Not worth.

Other than that, nice event. The new skins are interesting. I'm sure some people will love them, but I think Moo Moo Alistar has not been topped.

My 2 cents.

Totally agree, this mission is just r%%%%%ed.
I actually DO care about this icon, but i dont think i can complete it. I never  have 5 ppl who
-interested in this mission
-Havent done it yet
-Online and can play
in a single moment of time.
Tried to look for ppl in custom games list, but they dont care about it.
{{item:3151}}

I did the co-op missions, but it was incredibly frustrating and in no way an enjoyable experience. All the joy of trying to run an online tournament with random people with none of the upsides of actually getting good games. And people mistakenly played the troll comp in PvP games too.
I wanna do these soooooo bad but I don't have anyone other that my Husband who would help{{sticker:sg-janna}}

I really hate these "premade" missions, such as  "2b - Wait...Do what now?: ~~As a 5 player pre-made~~-"

not everyone has friends to que up with. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

i don't know if you read this, but: please, if you're gonna make missions that require a 5man premade, make them more worthwhile than 2 BE (???) and perhaps not as time wasting as "losing a coop game". not everyone has 4 people to play with, and even in the event that you might find 4 people to play with, why would you waste your time _losing a coop game_ when you could, idk, play a normal and get more exp/mastery points, or just have more fun than forcing yourself to lose?  
  
i'm glad you take into account people who prefer ARAM to SR, but there's still a lot to improve on when making those missions.

also, an event tab in the client with the overview and the mission trees would have made a few things a lot easier. is it because this is just an april's fools event that we don't get that kind of transparency? because this isn't a "real" VS event? :/
I hate the 5 man premade missions. Can you guess why? :P

I don't get it, why did the amount of mission decreased? I liked them and getting free stuff.
Where's the emotes you would give out for doing missions during these events 

cat or a dog emote :( ?
I have 200 Co-op vs AI wins and 0 losses, are you telling me i'm forced to ruin this W/L ration just to get the Platinum Icon...? That's so not cool :(
lamest quests ever.. 5 man premade, really riot? Keep adding crap like this and I'll delete the game for sure
Wait . thats all ? waiting all this time for few mission and icon ?
STOP WITH THE DAMMNED CO-OP MISSIONS FFS, NOBODY WANTS TO DO THEM!!!!!!!!!!!!
Can you delete the lose AI game mission?which one think of this mission make no sense?why I need to lose by mean?

I thought this list was only a "warm ups event mission list" and the real event would start at 1st or 2nd April with some new mode and/or challenging/fun missions to do. I just noticed this "Here is the full Mission & Reward list for the April Fools Event" today, with the ARURF mode removed from the game I feel so disappointed.
 {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
sry,I don’t want lose record in bot game,any idea?

> [{quoted}](name=YORHÄ2B,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=sgddxKjb,comment-id=002a,timestamp=2019-03-28T21:20:45.521+0000)
>
> sry,I don’t want lose record in bot game,any idea?

Exactly. REMOVE THAT MISSION PLEASE.

Mission 2b - Wait...Do what now?:

The most cynical joke ever. 
Not only forcing players to intentionally lose (while this is becoming an increasing problem in real games).
But the initial reward is a net loss because if you lose you will get less xp which in the end are worth more BE than the 2 you get. So it is basically treating players like dogs and training them to do a trick. And the final reward (M3) is an icon...

Thanks for the changes to the Nunu/other mission!  This was an interesting idea to have an easy and hard path.  In the future, if you do a similar mission line, you could make the easy mission so impossibly easy that nobody could complete it by accident.  

Example "impossibly easy" mission:  Place three control wards in your team's fountain.
Wait that's actually not fair. Now i can't get the icon because i chose the wrong path

Wait... Do What Now? 

Worst quest ever designed.
 
You should be fired for being so bad at your job.

Being forced to use an external source like Discord or Forum boards to find a group to waste 30mins to LOSE to co-op bots and Gain ZERO XP

Wow, you are are beyond incompetent to say the least. 

This is not for you buddy. Pretty sure a monkey can design a quest with more common sense to it.

So.. yesterday i bought the 7.5k bundle and the gemstone bundle.. and now i can't buy another one of the 7.5k bundles? 
like.. you did accept my RP purchase.. why can't you accept me purchase of bundles? i'm frustrated....  {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
